fields.summary: Error: java.lang.RuntimeException: Error in configuring object  Caused by: java.lang.OutOfMemoryError: GC overhead limit exceeded

comments.body:
turn off map join will make your query normal!!!

Â 

hive.auto.convert.join=false

hive.ignore.mapjoin.hint=false
